name: Abdul Momin
description: I love this little vehicle. I had a 2020 BMW 3 Series and this one has all the bells and whistles that I always wanted that one to have. Very comfortable and loaded with fun features. Best car on the market for the money. BMW 3 Series so far, not too bad...

name: Habib
description: I love this little vehicle. I had a 2020 BMW 3 Series and this one has all the bells and whistles that I always wanted that one to have. Very comfortable and loaded with fun features. Best car on the market for the money. BMW 3 Series so far, not too bad...

name: John Deo
description: I really like this product. I got a lot of fun doing it. And I like that car a lot. Adhan to go out with the family. We love our BMW 3 Series. It’s meet our needs and we can’t be more satisfy with the gas mileage...

name: Ahsan
description: 2022 BMW 3 Series model but much more space than my older model. Driving stability is significantly better and even better gas mileage is 36-41 mpg. I actually went to see a used 2020 BMW 3 Series with 53k miles to another dealer they wanted $ 16500 which is crazy to me...

name: Rifat
description: LOVE it so far, no bad paint job, the only thing i wish is in theBMW 3 Series model is that there were back seat ac vents placed somewhere, a drivers side memory seat, and a front center storage compartment. I mean the wireless charging pad is good too. Other then that all around good looking car inside and out....
